# infinite

**Type Property**

Returns the region that encloses all points.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var infinite: UIRegion { get }
```

## Return Value

A shared region object that encompasses an infinite area.

## Creating and initializing regions

- **init(size:)**: Initializes and returns a rectangular region of the specified size.
- **init(radius:)**: Initializes and returns a region with a circular shape of the specified radius.
